messages.message: my understanding is that we had lower hanging fruit — all the file read/write operations we do between flow steps. Cutting those out via cache was simpler and already going to substantially increase speed.

additionally, arrow is optimized towards linear algebra/mathematical workflows. our main compute chokepoints are (a) OCR (which we can’t optimize much given 3rd party containers), (b) regexes, none of which fits that mathematical/analytics workflows.
